pullrequest.title: Update IMU noise (redo of pull request #1754)

content.raw:
see 52d7aa4d90c8 in branch `update_imu_noise_scpeters`

The noise pointers are only created if sdf parameters are supplied, but the update function was dereferencing them no matter what. Instead I wrote a loop over the elements of the `noises` map to apply them if they exist
content.html:
see 52d7aa4d90c8 in branch update_imu_noise_scpeters

The noise pointers are only created if sdf parameters are supplied, but the update function was dereferencing them no matter what. Instead I wrote a loop over the elements of the noises map to apply them if they exist
